What is Twar2 App and how does it help us? Twar2 app explained simply, that if you get in trouble and need help from the people closest to you in the same geographic location, you will open the app and write the details of your issue with some pictures if any, and specify the geographical extent within which the app will send a notification to all the people in the same range, until they come To help you. Examples of how to use the app Examples 1
Your car broke down in a tricky place for some reason. With the Twar2 App, you will write that your car has broken down and specify the necessary details, as well as the geographical range (20 km for example). Then a notification will be sent to all people within the geographic range you previously specified for your condition and problem (Definitely not necessary to provide people with your real location in case you don\'t want to).
Example 2
If you were in the hospital and needed someone to donate blood to you, you can write your problem with, for example, the details of the blood type, the name of the hospital, and the condition, and it is also possible to activate a mobile number to be communicated through it, and the notification will be sent to people in the same steps as the previous example
Example 3
If you forgot important papers or things somewhere, instead of going by yourself and looking for them, you can specify the place where you were and publish your problem with details to contact you (a mobile number for example) or enable chatting, then the notification will reach people and they can contact you in case they are found The things.
Twar2 App is not responsible for its misuse in any way, and any user is the only one responsible for the privacy and importance of the data that he published through it.
Important notes:
